id: Yemeni Government, Houthi Rebels Agree to Peace Talks, U.N. Says
paragraph:
November 17, 2018UNITED NATIONS—The United Nations’ special envoy to Yemen, Martin Griffiths, said Friday that warring factions there had committed to convening peace talks in Sweden shortly.A date hasn’t been set, but diplomats said they could begin this month.Diplomatic talks have stalled for months while the conflict has escalated, and Friday’s announcement...
